fields.name: contentTextStyle
fields.desc: Style for the text in the [content] of the [MaterialBanner].

fields.name: actions
fields.desc: The set of actions that are displayed at the bottom or trailing side of the [MaterialBanner].

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: The z-coordinate at which to place the material banner.

fields.name: minActionBarHeight
fields.desc: The optional minimum action bar height.

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The color of the surface of this [MaterialBanner].

fields.name: surfaceTintColor
fields.desc: The color used as an overlay on [backgroundColor] to indicate elevation.

fields.name: shadowColor
fields.desc: The color of the shadow below the [MaterialBanner].

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The amount of space by which to inset the [content].

fields.name: leadingPadding
fields.desc: The amount of space by which to inset the [leading] widget.

fields.name: forceActionsBelow
fields.desc: An override to force the [actions] to be below the [content] regardless of how many there are.

fields.name: overflowAlignment
fields.desc: The horizontal alignment of the [actions] when the [actions] laid out in a column.

fields.name: animation
fields.desc: The animation driving the entrance and exit of the material banner when presented by the [ScaffoldMessenger].

fields.name: onVisible
fields.desc: Called the first time that the material banner is visible within a [Scaffold] when presented by the [ScaffoldMessenger].

nodes.name: Usage of MaterialBanner in a Single Line
Usage of MaterialBanner in Two Lines
desc: When the number of trailing components is greater than 1, the component structure is left-center-bottom.
